data.name: KotLand
data.description: KotLand is the biggest Kotlin conference in the Eastern Europe. Speakers from all over the world will share their experience about Kotlin on Android, Server, Web, Multiplatform and Native.

relatedRecords.name: Global Azure Bulgaria 2020
relatedRecords.location: Microsoft Innovation Center | Sofia Tech Park | 111B, Tsarigradsko Shousse Blvd | 1784 Sofia | Bulga
relatedRecords.description:
A unique community event that will take place on April 25, 2020 for the seventh time in Bulgaria . One day deep dive class to help thousands of people get up to speed on developing Cloud Computing Applications for Microsoft Azure.
The event will be focused on technical sessions in several tracks.
